identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical/HUD' study interface that feels like a security operations center, not a classroom. Fusion of Swiss Design clarity and Cyberpunk aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'EdTech' with 'SecOps Dashboard'.
Content is King: Questions are the 'Intel'. Treat them with high hierarchy.
Zoom In: Focus on the data (progress, weak spots).
Negative Space: Critical for long reading sessions.

headings.usage: All section headers, stats, and 'system' labels.

ui.usage: Buttons, badges, navigation items, small labels.

usage_rules: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors + subtle noise/grain.
Primary color is for 'Success' and 'Action' only.

textures: Noise Overlay: Add a fixed, pointer-events-none div with a noise bg image at 3% opacity over the entire app.
Scanlines: Optional subtle horizontal lines on Dark Mode dashboard backgrounds.
effects: Glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' + 'bg-background/80' for sticky headers and floating controls.
Glow: Add 'shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(16,185,129,0.2)]' to the primary CTA in dark mode.
borders: Tech Borders: Use 1px borders. On cards, consider adding a 'corner accent' (a small 4px colored line at the top left).

strategies: Dashboard: 4-column grid. 'Readiness Score' takes 2x2. 'Domains' take 1x1. 'Streak' takes 1x2 (tall).
Study Mode: Single column, max-width-3xl, centered. Distraction-free.
Exam Mode: Full screen, hidden navigation, timer fixed at top.

customization_rules.Card: Remove default shadow. Add 1px border. In Dark Mode, add a subtle hover glow.
customization_rules.Button: Sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes. Font: JetBrains Mono.
customization_rules.Progress: Thick bars (h-4). Striped animation for 'Active' state.

specific_components.name: HeatmapCalendar
specific_components.description: GitHub-style contribution graph for study streaks. Use 'react-calendar-heatmap' or build with grid.

specific_components.name: DomainRadar
specific_components.description: Radar chart (Recharts) showing proficiency across the 5 SY0-701 domains.

specific_components.name: QuestionCard
specific_components.description: The core study unit. Needs 'Question Text', 'Code Snippet Area' (if needed), 'Options List', 'Explanation Panel' (collapsible).

icons.usage: Use 'Shield' for Security, 'Target' for Goals, 'Lightning' for Streaks, 'Brain' for Knowledge.

images.description: Dark, moody laptop scene with green accents. Use with heavy overlay (opacity 20%) for Landing Page hero.
Abstract lock on black. Perfect for the side panel of the Login/Register page.

rules: Success State: When answering correctly, flash the card border Green.

anti_slop: NO generic 'SaaS Blue' (#3B82F6). Use the custom Emerald/Sky palette.
NO centered text for long questions. Always left-align for readability.
NO 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use real security terms (Phishing, DDoS, Malware) in placeholders.
accessibility: Focus rings must be visible (Use 'ring-2 ring-primary').

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a 'Tactical Study Tool'. Think of it as a piece of software used by a cyber operative to train. It should feel fast, responsive, and precise. Use the 'JetBrains Mono' font to sell the coding/terminal aesthetic. Implement the Dark/Light toggle immediately as it changes the entire vibe.
